table_description: AWS EMR Block Public Access Configuration

columns.name: block_public_security_group_rules
columns.description: Indicates whether Amazon EMR block public access is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

columns.name: created_by_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name that created or last modified the configuration.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time that the configuration was created.

columns.name: permitted_public_security_group_rule_ranges
columns.description: Specifies ports and port ranges that are permitted to have security group rules that allow inbound traffic from all public sources.
